content.question: Mrs. Pontellier’s feelings are communicated primarily through which technique of third-person narration?

choices.label: Explicit statement of the emotions that she experiences
Observations made by Mr. Pontellier about her distress
Comments by Mrs. Pontellier explaining her discontent
Descriptions of Mrs. Pontellier’s actions that signal her state of mind

content.answer: Descriptions of Mrs. Pontellier’s actions that signal her state of mind

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify and explain the function of point of view in a narrative.
